issue.title: C++: Add re2 as optional 3rd-party toolchain dependency
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-29](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-29). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We will want to eventually add RE2 wrapper functions which yield Arrow data structures resulting from applying regular expressions to Arrow data representing strings (for example, to implement operations like split_all(String) -> List<String>)
